challenge.title: An Introduction To Statistical Learning - Chapter 10
challenge.description: Daniela Witten, Gareth James, Trevor Hastie, and Robert Tibshirani's An Introduction To Statistical Learning is an introduction to statistical learning using R (programming language).
challenge.instructions: Read An Introduction To Statistical Learning, Chapter Ten, on E-Reserve at Archive.org and follow along with coding exercises.
